message.content:
cs.HC, cs.IR, cs.SD, cs.CYBER, cs.SE 

Reasoning: 
- cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) is the most likely category as the paper focuses on the development of a smart home system that is user-friendly and can be controlled through an Android app. 
- cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is also likely as the paper mentions the use of sensors to collect data on temperature, humidity, and current, which can be used to automatically control the environment. 
- cs.SD (Software Development) is another possible category as the paper describes the development of the Android app and micro-web server used in the smart home system. 
- cs.CYBER (Cybersecurity) is a potential category as the paper mentions the use of intrusion detection sensors and email notifications in case of a security breach. 
- cs.SE (Software Engineering) is also possible as the paper discusses the design and implementation of the smart home system using Arduino Ethernet and various sensors.
